arStrings.szText:
{c_label}Cooldown:{/c_label} {c_resource}{Cooldown Time}{/c_resource} seconds
{if:ADVANCED_TOOLTIP}{c_label}Lucky Hit Chance: {/c}{c_resource}[{Combat Effect Chance}|%|]{/c}
{/if}For {c_number}{buffduration:CASTER_SKILL_ACTIVE}{/c} seconds, you corrupt surrounding enemies, dealing {c_number}{dot:SOUL_EXTRACTED}{/c} damage per second.  

Every {c_number}[SF_4|2|]{/c} seconds of this duration, you absorb the souls of up to {c_number}{SF_7}{/c} enemies, gaining {c_number}{SF_6}{/c} Essence and a {c_important}{u}Barrier{/u}{/c} for {c_number}[{SF_26}*100|%|]{/c} of your Maximum Life {c_number}([Max(1,{shield:BUFF_SHIELD})]){/c} for {c_number}{buffduration:BUFF_SHIELD}{/c} seconds.

You absorb {c_number}{SF_13}{/c} souls at a time from Bosses.

{icon:bullet, 1.2} Damage per second {icon:arrow, 1.2} {c_number}{dot:SOUL_EXTRACTED}{/c}
{icon:bullet,1.2} Cooldown {icon:arrow,1.2} {c_number}{Cooldown Time}{/c} seconds
Increases your damage by [{SF_14}*100|%x|] per stack.

Every soul absorbed increases your damage by {c_number}[{SF_14}*100|x%|]{/c}, up to {c_number}[{SF_16}*{SF_14}*100|x%|]{/c}. This bonus persists for {c_number}{SF_15}{/c} seconds after {c_important}Soulrift{/c} ends.

Enemies with their souls absorbed become {c_important}{u}Vulnerable{/u}{/c} for {c_number}{SF_18}{/c} seconds. 

When damaging enemies affected by {c_important}Soulrift{/c}, you have a {c_number}[{SF_17}*100|%|]{/c} chance to absorb their soul.
